Keywords: Annihilators , Codex , Cosmic , Defenders , Fantastic Four , Herald
Real Name: Norrin Radd
Special Powers
DAWN GREENWOOD, ORDINARY GIRL FROM EARTH: At the beginning of the game, generate a Dawn Greenwood bystander.
ANYWHERE AND EVERYWHERE: Hypersonic Speed. When Silver Surfer uses it, after resolutions you may choose a character he hit or moved through. The chosen character gains Immobile until your next turn.
I ONLY ATTACK TO DEFEND: FREE: Choose a standard attack power an opposing character within 8 squares can use. Silver Surfer can use that power until your next turn.

August 30, 2021
Goop
It took many years but we finally got an awesome Surfer. 150 does cost a lot but dang he is brutal if you can get the right map. The Greenwood bystander is extremely useful too, nobody will dare attack her. An excellent piece that will make your opponent sweat when they see him. He could easily have been a SR or Chase.
July 25, 2021
Just Some Coffee
Played him with Black Leopard PRIME and a support piece. Cleaned the floor with a high meta team EASILY. His IMMOBILE is so easily overlooked, but if you're playing against an engage squad, you're going to ruin their day.

hoojeebo
@Pyreus Kril: Silver Surfer can't use *any* power printed on the card, only those Attack powers that the character can currently use. You can copy any Attack power that was chosen that turn via pick-a-power, but only that power.
